dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 2657 IH: To clarify the counting of electoral votes in Congress to be a National Special Security Event.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Torres of New York introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Homeland Security

form.official-title: To clarify the counting of electoral votes in Congress to be a National Special Security Event.

section.header: Counting of electoral votes in Congress is a National Special Security Event
section.text: The counting of electoral college votes in Congress pursuant to section 15 of title 3, United States Code, is a National Special Security Event (as such term is defined in section 2001(9) of the Homeland Security Act of 2002 (6 U.S.C. 601(9))).
